volop.name: UGANDA: Volunteer Opportunity to teach in Primary Schools and High schools.
volop.description:
Join FCG's teaching projects in primary schools of Gomba district and high schools. You can teach primary or high school classes, including academic subjects and life skills, and organize sport and art activities for the children. Let us know what you’re interested in teaching and we’ll get you into the best placement for you. School terms are always open from February 1 to April 30, May 20 to August 20, Sept 16 to November 30.

This program offers an oopportunity to:

  • Work closely with our primary school children through teaching them your favorable language.
  • Sharing your knowledge and skills with students in high schools.
  • You can be an instructor in other skills like sports, music or other skills. Other subjects can also be taught if you have knowledge or experience in those areas.
  • Make a positive impact on the lives of Ugandan children and communities.

Gain valuable experience, immerse yourself in African culture, and contribute to the education and well-being of those who need it most.

  • Hands-On Experience, Lasting Impact.

Our program offers a unique, hands-on experience, allowing volunteers to:

  • Build meaningful relationships with children
  • Share knowledge, skills, and experiences
  • Make a tangible, positive impact on young lives

By getting directly involved with the children, you'll have the opportunity to inspire, educate, and empower them, leaving a lasting legacy in their lives.

  • Comfortable Accommodations, Warm Welcomes.

We ensure that our volunteers have a comfortable and convenient place to stay, with options.

  • Develop meaningful relationships with the children and local community.
